text: om'me nagarada janaru niddeyalliddāga avaru nagaravannu pravēśisidaru. Alli avaru, ibbaru paraspara jagaḷāḍuttiruvudannu kaṇḍaru. Avarallobbanu avara pāḷayadavanāgiddanu mattu innobbanu avara śatru pāḷayadavanāgiddanu. Avara pāḷayadavanu, avara śatru pāḷayadavana virud'dha avara neravannu bēḍidanu. Mūsā ātanige (śatru pāḷayadavanige) hoḍedaru mattu adu ātana antyakke kāraṇavāyitu. Avaru (mūsā) ‘‘idu śaitānana kr̥tya. Avanu khaṇḍita spaṣṭavāgi dārigeḍisuva śatruvāgiddāne’’ endaru
